verses.name: Acts 28:4
verses.text: And when the barbarians saw the venomous beast hang on his hand, they said among themselves, No doubt this man is a murderer, whom, though he hath escaped the sea, yet vengeance suffereth not to live.

verses.name: Acts 28:5
verses.text: And he shook off the beast into the fire, and felt no harm.

verses.name: Acts 28:6
verses.text: Howbeit they looked when he should have swollen, or fallen down dead suddenly: but after they had looked a great while, and saw no harm come to him, they changed their minds, and said that he was a god.
